Texto: 
large left abdominal mass during initial neonatal physical exam
left nephrectomy.  will be treated with outpatient chemotherapy.
us and ct show large 6 x 5 cm solid homogeneous mass arising from the left kidney with associated pelvicaliectasis.
wilms tumor
congenital mesoblastic nephroma
wilms tumor
3 day old male found to have large left abdominal mass on physical exam.
neonatal renal tumors are very rare.  the most common solid renal tumor up to 3 months of age is congenital mesoblastic nephroma.  neonatal wilms' tumors are extremely rare.
